1.content:
Your name is Daniel and you always loved annoying your older sister Jane with various gimmicks and pranks, though you didn't generally take it too far in your opinion. Most of the time it was just simple little things like taking her diary and reading her secrets from it and she always said she was going to get you back for it but she never did and she just got you back by doing things like tying you to a chair and make you watch things or listen to music you hated while she sat on you

One day you were in her room searching for her diary when you heard her come in through the front door and slam it shut. It was only you and her as your parents were away on a cruise around the world and wouldn't be back for a long time and unfortunately they left Jane in charge. She then thudded up the stairs to her room, you didn't know what to do as you knew there was a marathon of programs you hated which went on for three days and you didn't want to have to watch it with your sister sitting,eating and possibly letting it rip on your nose. You quickly dived under her bed as you has practised many times before while she was away. You then saw her feet standing in front of you and then a pair of panties drop to the ground and £5 fluttered right in front of you. Jane then reached down and saw you and she screamed, you knew this was going to end badly. She then yanked you out from under the bed and got out the tying up chair she had and strapped you in. She then gagged you and blindfolded you which she didn't usually do. She then muttered a few words then took off your blindfold. You noticed she was wearing a new set of clothes which you had never seen before when you looked for her diary. She then said to you "I am a witch and now I am going to play a little game with you. It is a game were you either transform or shrink whichever game you want to play and if you are used or found then i win the point but if you aren't then the point is yours. If you win I won't tell mom and dad when they get home about this serious pervertedness . However if I win then You will be forced to watch every show that you hate with me on top of you and you will be my personal toilet and i will tell mom and dad and you could go to jail or I might think of another punishment for you instead." You decide you should play you couldn't be in any worse situation than you are now so you told your sister you will play. She then asks you which game you want to play SHRINK or TRANSFORMATION
1.title: The beginning

12.content:
You decide to play the transformation game as you had always fantacised about it when you read about it on sites such as writing.com. Jane then explained the rules which were 1- that she wouldn't know what you transformed into as it would be a random object. 2-If you were used then you would transform back when she removed herself from you. 3-you could only win points by not being used for one day but you couldn't change what object you randomly transformed into.

She then said that you would begin playing and the first person to get 10 points would win. She then muttered a few words from a spell book and then she shouted out "random transformation" and with that you blanced out. When you woke up you noticed you were
12.title: transformation game

choices: picks you out and wears you
Picks out another pair of panties
121.content: You noticed immediatly what you had become, it was obvious as you noticed two holes beside you and one big hole abouve you. You had become a pair of pink lacy panties of Janes. You then hear her begin to move and pick something to wear. During this time you noticed that your senses all worked fine and maybe even better and you also had 360 degree vision just like you had read about and it was even cooler. You then saw a light and you saw janes face look in at you and other panties. It was now morning as htere was light outside but it was night when you transformed, this must be part of Janes plan so now you have to hopefuly not be used by Jane until tomorrow morning. Jane reached her hand into the drawer and
121.title: Panties

choices: Waking then suddenly to being a horse saddle
Awaken then to being some sisterly slacks
Wake to being something she uses to tickle her fancy
1211.content:
Perverse is what you like to watch from under her bed, and being a pair of silky panties tends to give added new thrills of what a brother likes about an older sister.

The summery day is warm and she perspires as the scent of her drives your ability to smell crazy.

Later, you were discarded into the wash hamper where you changed back to being a real brother. It began again the next day when you were arranging some personal items setting on your bedroom chest of drawers that she walked into the room and said "Brother Transform."
1211.title: picks you out and wears you

info.brief_description: You play a game with your sister where you change randomly
info.description:
You anger your sister and now you find out she is a witch and so now you must play a game were you are either transformed (into random unknown items) or shrunk and you must hope you aren't used and hope you win by not being found for one day.

Characters

Daniel: aged 16 short brown hair, small for his age enjoys games consoles. Enjoys looking on transformation sites but thinks it is impossible

Jane:sister aged 19 medium lengthed black hair is smaller than Daniel. She has been a witch as long as she can remember but no one else knows except her

Rules

1. No swearing
2.If Daniel is transformed into an object and that object is used then his sister wins the point but if the object isn't used for one day Daniel wins the point.
3. Daniel can also be shrunk and sent to a random place and Jane must find him. if he is found the point is Janes and she can use him in one way then start again
4.If Daniel is used he will transform back when his objects purpose is completed and Jane is off him. If he is still being used after the day then he will transform back in the size and position he was in until he is removed e.g if he was a bed and Jane was sleeping on him and the day is up then he will be the same position as the bed until she gets off him
5. NO NEW CHARACTERS this is just between Daniel and Jane as their parents are away around the world
6.Objects must be inside their house nothing outside
7.Jane doesn't know what objects Daniel has transformed into she just has to hope she is using him
8. furniture and toilet objects may also be used just no male objects only female

Other than that have fun and make an addition as there is GP available for good additions
